plugin._field_explanation:
ALLOCATIONS ON THE MAIN THREAD type_effect: Number of effect slots type_event: Number of event slots type_location: Number of location slots type_lightprobe: Number of lightprobe slots
THREAD MESSAGES type_effect_message: Number of main-->render messages Most effect components require 2 messages + 1 x number of locations type_effect_reverse_message: Number of render-->main messages (attached effects to particles) Holdback not implemented due to complexity.
ALLOCATIONS ON THE RENDER THREAD tracer system Number of instances tracer location Number of instances * markers tracer Number of instances * markers * tag-block-entries tracer profile row x16 = Number of tracer profiles
type_decal_system Number of instances type_decal Number of instances * tag-block-entries type_decal_vertex Number of decal vertices type_decal_index Number of decal indices
type_light_volume_system Number of instances type_light_volume_location Number of instances * markers type_light_volume Number of instances * markers * tag-block-entries type_light_volume_profile_row x16 =Number of light_volume profiles
type_particle_system Number of instances type_particle_location Number of instances * markers type_particle_emitter Number of instances * markers * tag-block-entries type_cpu_particle Number of cpu particles type_gpu_particle_row x16 =Number of gpu particles (includes cpu particles)
SPAWNS TO THE GPU type_particle_queue Number of particles created in a frame (includes cpu particles) tracer queue Number of tracer profiles created in a frame

_field_block_64.name: priorities
_field_block_64._field_explanation: Whichever is larger will be used

_field_dword_integer.name: How many available at this priority*!

plugin._field_explanation: Effect played when an object of this type spawns in during each game mode. Can be overridden per-object in the object definition tag
